mosinstall.name: Frontpage
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: This component shows all the published content items from your site marked Show on Frontpage.

param.name: menu_image
param.label: Menu Image
param.description: A small image to be placed to the left or right of your menu item, images must be in images/stories/

param.name: pageclass_sfx
param.label: Page Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual page styling

param.name: header
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Text to display at the top of the page

param.name: page_title
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Show/Hide the Page title

param.name: back_button
param.label: Back Button
param.description: Show/Hide a Back Button, that returns you to the previously view page

param.name: leading
param.label: # Leading
param.description: Number of Items to display as a leading (full width) item. 0 will mean that no items will be displayed as leading.

param.name: intro
param.label: # Intro
param.description: Number of Items to display with the introduction text shown.

param.name: columns
param.label: Columns
param.description: When displaying the intro text, how many columns to use per row

param.name: link
param.label: # Links
param.description: Number of Items to display as Links.

param.name: orderby_pri
param.label: Category Order
param.description: Order items by catgeory
param.option: No, order by Primary Order only

param.name: orderby_sec
param.label: Primary Order
param.description: Order that the items will be displayed in.

param.name: pagination
param.label: Pagination
param.description: Show/Hide Pagination support

param.name: pagination_results
param.label: Pagination Results
param.description: Show/Hide Pagination Results info ( e.g 1-4 of 4 )

param.name: image
param.label: MOSImages
param.description: Display {mosimages}.

param.name: section
param.label: Section Name
param.description: Show/Hide the Section the item belongs to

param.name: section_link
param.label: Section Name Linkable
param.description: Make the Section text a link to the actual section page

param.name: category
param.label: Category Name
param.description: Show/Hide the Category the item belongs to

param.name: category_link
param.label: Category Name Linkable
param.description: Make the Category text a link to the actual Category page

param.name: item_title
param.label: Item Titles
param.description: Show/Hide the items title

param.name: link_titles
param.label: Linked Titles
param.description: Make your Item titles linkable

param.name: readmore
param.label: Read More
param.description: Show/Hide the Read More link

param.name: rating
param.label: Item Rating
param.description: Show/Hide the item rating - only affects this page

param.name: author
param.label: Author Names
param.description: Show/Hide the item author - only affects this page

param.name: createdate
param.label: Created Date and Time
param.description: Show/Hide the item creation date - only affects this page

param.name: modifydate
param.label: Modified Date and Time
param.description: Show/Hide the item modification date - only affects this page

param.name: pdf
param.label: PDF Icon
param.description: Show/Hide the item pdf button - only affects this page

param.name: print
param.label: Print Icon
param.description: Show/Hide the item print button - only affects this page

param.name: email
param.label: Email Icon
param.description: Show/Hide the item email button - only affects this page
